segments.source_content: To set up your site's blog, start by creating a `blog` directory.

translations.zh-CN: 要搭建站点博客，请先创建`blog`目录。

segments.source_content: Then, add an item link to your blog within `docusaurus.config.js`:

translations.zh-CN: 然后在`docusaurus.config.js`中添加博客导航链接：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f2b711c6

segments.source_content: ## Adding posts {#adding-posts}

translations.zh-CN: ## 添加文章 {#adding-posts}

segments.source_content: To publish in the blog, create a Markdown file within the blog directory.

translations.zh-CN: 在博客目录中创建Markdown文件即可发布文章。

segments.source_content: For example, create a file at `website/blog/2019-09-05-hello-docusaurus.md`:

translations.zh-CN: 例如创建`website/blog/2019-09-05-hello-docusaurus.md`文件：

segments.source_content:
```md title="website/blog/2019-09-05-hello-docusaurus.md"
---
title: Welcome Docusaurus
description: This is my first post on Docusaurus.
slug: welcome-docusaurus-v2
authors:
  - name: Joel Marcey
    title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
    url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
    image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
    socials:
      x: joelmarcey
      github: JoelMarcey
  - name: Sébastien Lorber
    title: Docusaurus maintainer
    url: https://sebastienlorber.com
    image_url: https://github.com/slorber.png
    socials:
      x: sebastienlorber
      github: slorber
tags: [hello, docusaurus-v2]
image: https://i.imgur.com/mErPwqL.png
hide_table_of_contents: false
---

Welcome to this blog. This blog is created with [**Docusaurus**](https://docusaurus.io/).

<!-- truncate -->

This is my first post on Docusaurus.

A whole bunch of exploration to follow.
```

segments.source_content: The [front matter](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-intro.mdx#front-matter) is useful to add more metadata to your blog post, for example, author information, but Docusaurus will be able to infer all necessary metadata without the front matter. For all possible fields, see [the API documentation](api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#markdown-front-matter).

translations.zh-CN: 通过[front matter](./guides/markdown-features/markdown-features-intro.mdx#front-matter)可为文章添加作者等元数据，但Docusaurus也能自动推断必要信息。完整字段说明参见[API文档](api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#markdown-front-matter)。

segments.source_content: ## Blog list {#blog-list}

translations.zh-CN: ## 博客列表 {#blog-list}

segments.source_content: The blog's index page (by default, it is at `/blog`) is the _blog list page_, where all blog posts are collectively displayed.

translations.zh-CN: 博客首页（默认路径为`/blog`）即_博客列表页_，集中展示所有文章。

segments.source_content: Use the `<!--truncate-->` marker in your blog post to represent what will be shown as the summary when viewing all published blog posts. Anything above `<!--truncate-->` will be part of the summary. Note that the portion above the truncate marker must be standalone renderable Markdown. For example:

translations.zh-CN: 在文章中使用`<!--truncate-->`标记定义摘要内容。该标记前的部分将作为文章预览。注意摘要部分必须是独立可渲染的Markdown内容，例如：

segments.source_content:
```md title="website/blog/my-post.md" {7}
---
title: Markdown blog truncation example
---

All these will be part of the blog post summary.

<!-- truncate -->

But anything from here on down will not be.
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b73a4a7a

segments.source_content: For files using the `.mdx` extension, use a [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/) comment `{/* truncate */}` instead:

translations.zh-CN: 对于`.mdx`文件，请使用[MDX](https://mdxjs.com/)注释`{/* truncate */}`：

segments.source_content:
```md title="website/blog/my-post.mdx" {7}
---
title: MDX blog truncation Example
---

All these will be part of the blog post summary.

{/* truncate */}

But anything from here on down will not be.
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a476a172

If you set `postsPerPage: 'ALL'`, pagination will be disabled and all posts will be displayed on the first page. You can also add a meta description to the blog list page for better SEO:

@@untranslatable_placeholder_f155ef1e

segments.source_content: ## Blog sidebar {#blog-sidebar}

translations.zh-CN: ## 博客侧边栏 {#blog-sidebar}

segments.source_content: The blog sidebar displays recent blog posts. The default number of items shown is 5, but you can customize with the `blogSidebarCount` option in the plugin configuration. By setting `blogSidebarCount: 0`, the sidebar will be completely disabled, with the container removed as well. This will increase the width of the main container. Specially, if you have set `blogSidebarCount: 'ALL'`, _all_ posts will be displayed.

translations.zh-CN: 侧边栏默认展示5篇最新文章，通过`blogSidebarCount`参数可调整数量。设为`0`将完全禁用侧边栏（容器也会移除）以增加主内容区宽度。特殊值`'ALL'`会显示_所有_文章。

segments.source_content: You can also alter the sidebar heading text with the `blogSidebarTitle` option. For example, if you have set `blogSidebarCount: 'ALL'`, instead of the default "Recent posts", you may rather make it say "All posts":

translations.zh-CN: 通过`blogSidebarTitle`可修改侧边栏标题。例如当使用`blogSidebarCount: 'ALL'`时，可将默认的"最新文章"改为"全部文章"：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_e908327f

segments.source_content: ## Blog post date {#blog-post-date}

translations.zh-CN: ## 文章日期 {#blog-post-date}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus will extract a `YYYY-MM-DD` date from many patterns such as `YYYY-MM-DD-my-blog-post-title.md` or `YYYY/MM/DD/my-blog-post-title.md`. This enables you to easily group blog posts by year, by month, or to use a flat structure.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus支持从`YYYY-MM-DD-my-blog-post-title.md`或`YYYY/MM/DD/my-blog-post-title.md`等路径模式提取`YYYY-MM-DD`格式日期，便于按年/月分组或使用扁平结构。

segments.source_content:
<details>
<summary>Supported date extraction patterns</summary>

| Pattern | Example |
| --- | --- |
| Single file | `2021-05-28-my-blog-post-title.md` |
| MDX file | `2021-05-28-my-blog-post-title.mdx` |
| Single folder + `index.md` | `2021-05-28-my-blog-post-title/index.md` |
| Folder named by date | `2021-05-28/my-blog-post-title.md` |
| Nested folders by date | `2021/05/28/my-blog-post-title.md` |
| Partially nested folders by date | `2021/05-28-my-blog-post-title.md` |
| Nested folders + `index.md` | `2021/05/28/my-blog-post-title/index.md` |
| Date in the middle of path | `category/2021/05-28-my-blog-post-title.md` |

Docusaurus can extract the date from the posts using any of the naming patterns above. It is advisable to choose one pattern and apply it to all posts to avoid confusion.

</details>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_e59d0121

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Using a folder can be convenient to co-locate blog post images alongside the Markdown file.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

使用文件夹结构便于将文章配图与Markdown文件存放在同一目录。

:::

segments.source_content: This naming convention is optional, and you can also provide the date as front matter. Since the front matter follows YAML syntax where the datetime notation is supported, you can use front matter if you need more fine-grained publish dates. For example, if you have multiple posts published on the same day, you can order them according to the time of the day:

translations.zh-CN: 此命名约定是可选的，您也可以通过front matter提供日期。由于front matter遵循支持日期时间标记的YAML语法，如需更精确的发布日期，可使用front matter。例如，若同一天发布多篇文章，可按当天时间排序：

segments.source_content:
```md title="earlier-post.md"
---
date: 2021-09-13T10:00
---
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_d7c0a6db

segments.source_content:
```md title="later-post.md"
---

---
```

segments.source_content: ## Blog post authors {#blog-post-authors}

translations.zh-CN: ## 博文作者 {#blog-post-authors}

segments.source_content: Use the `authors` front matter field to declare blog post authors. An author should have at least a `name` or an `image_url`. Docusaurus uses information like `url`, `email`, and `title`, but any other information is allowed.

translations.zh-CN: 使用`authors` front matter字段声明博文作者。作者至少需包含`name`或`image_url`。Docusaurus会使用`url`、`email`和`title`等信息，但也允许其他信息。

segments.source_content: ### Inline authors {#inline-authors}

translations.zh-CN: ### 内联作者 {#inline-authors}

segments.source_content: Blog post authors can be declared directly inside the front matter:

translations.zh-CN: 博文作者可直接在front matter中声明：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="author-front-matter">
<TabItem value="single" label="Single author">

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  name: Joel Marcey
  title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
  url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
  image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
  email: jimarcey@gmail.com
  socials:
    x: joelmarcey
    github: JoelMarcey
---
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="multiple" label="Multiple authors">

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - name: Joel Marcey
    title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
    url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
    image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
    email: jimarcey@gmail.com
    socials:
      x: joelmarcey
      github: JoelMarcey
  - name: Sébastien Lorber
    title: Docusaurus maintainer
    url: https://sebastienlorber.com
    image_url: https://github.com/slorber.png
    socials:
      x: sebastienlorber
      github: slorber
---
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0f9ea278

segments.source_content:
:::tip

This option works best to get started, or for casual, irregular authors.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

此选项最适合快速上手，或用于临时性、非固定作者。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

Prefer using the `authors` front matter, but the legacy `author_*` front matter remains supported:

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
author: Joel Marcey
author_title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
author_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
author_image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
---
```

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

推荐使用`authors` front matter，但旧版`author_*` front matter仍受支持：

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
author: Joel Marcey
author_title: Docusaurus 1联合创始人
author_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
author_image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
---
```

:::

segments.source_content: ### Global authors {#global-authors}

translations.zh-CN: ### 全局作者 {#global-authors}

segments.source_content: For regular blog post authors, it can be tedious to maintain authors' information inlined in each blog post.

translations.zh-CN: 对于固定博文作者，在每篇博文中内联维护作者信息可能较为繁琐。

segments.source_content: It is possible to declare those authors globally in a configuration file:

translations.zh-CN: 可在配置文件中全局声明这些作者：

segments.source_content:
```yml title="website/blog/authors.yml"
jmarcey:
  name: Joel Marcey
  title: Co-creator of Docusaurus 1
  url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey
  image_url: https://github.com/JoelMarcey.png
  email: jimarcey@gmail.com
  socials:
    x: joelmarcey
    github: JoelMarcey

slorber:
  name: Sébastien Lorber
  title: Docusaurus maintainer
  url: https://sebastienlorber.com
  image_url: https://github.com/slorber.png
  socials:
    x: sebastienlorber
    github: slorber
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_79d8cec2

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use the `authorsMapPath` plugin option to configure the path. JSON is also supported.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

使用`authorsMapPath`插件选项配置路径。也支持JSON格式。

:::

segments.source_content: In blog posts front matter, you can reference the authors declared in the global configuration file:

translations.zh-CN: 在博文front matter中，可引用全局配置文件声明的作者：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="author-front-matter">
<TabItem value="single" label="Single author">

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors: jmarcey
---
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="multiple" label="Multiple authors">

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors: [jmarcey, slorber]
---
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_13c42e3f

segments.source_content:
:::info

The `authors` system is very flexible and can suit more advanced use-case:

<details>
  <summary>Mix inline authors and global authors</summary>

You can use global authors most of the time, and still use inline authors:

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - jmarcey
  - slorber
  - name: Inline Author name
    title: Inline Author Title
    url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
    image_url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>Local override of global authors</summary>

You can customize the global author's data on per-blog-post basis:

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - key: jmarcey
    title: Joel Marcey's new title
  - key: slorber
    name: Sébastien Lorber's new name
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>Localize the author's configuration file</summary>

The configuration file can be localized, just create a localized copy of it at:

```bash
website/i18n/[locale]/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/authors.yml
```

</details>

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

`authors`系统非常灵活，可满足更高级用例：

<details>
  <summary>混合使用内联作者和全局作者</summary>

可主要使用全局作者，同时保留内联作者：

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - jmarcey
  - slorber
  - name: 内联作者姓名
    title: 内联作者头衔
    url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
    image_url: https://github.com/inlineAuthor
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>全局作者的本地覆盖</summary>

可按博文自定义全局作者数据：

```md title="my-blog-post.md"
---
authors:
  - key: jmarcey
    title: Joel Marcey的新头衔
  - key: slorber
    name: Sébastien Lorber的新名字
---
```

</details>

<details>
  <summary>本地化作者配置文件</summary>

配置文件可本地化，只需创建其本地化副本于：

```bash
website/i18n/[locale]/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog/authors.yml
```

</details>

:::

segments.source_content: An author, either declared through front matter or through the authors map, needs to have a name or an avatar, or both. If all authors of a post don't have names, Docusaurus will display their avatars compactly. See [this test post](/tests/blog/2022/01/20/image-only-authors) for the effect.

translations.zh-CN: 无论是通过front matter还是作者映射声明的作者，都需要有名称或头像（或两者兼备）。若某篇博文所有作者均无名称，Docusaurus会紧凑显示其头像。效果可参见[此测试文章](/tests/blog/2022/01/20/image-only-authors)。

segments.source_content:
:::warning[Feed generation]

[RSS feeds](#feed) require the author's email to be set for the author to appear in the feed.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning[Feed生成]

[RSS feeds](#feed)需要设置作者的email才能在feed中显示。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Authors pages {#authors-pages}

translations.zh-CN: ### 作者页面 {#authors-pages}

segments.source_content: The authors pages feature is optional, and mainly useful for multi-author blogs.

translations.zh-CN: 作者页面功能是可选的，主要对多作者博客有用。

segments.source_content: You can activate it independently for each author by adding a `page: true` attribute to the [global author configuration](#global-authors):

translations.zh-CN: 您可为每位作者单独激活此功能，只需在[全局作者配置](#global-authors)中添加`page: true`属性：

segments.source_content:
```yml title="website/blog/authors.yml"
slorber:
  name: Sébastien Lorber
  // highlight-start
  page: true # Turns the feature on - route will be /authors/slorber
  // highlight-end

jmarcey:
  name: Joel Marcey
  // highlight-start
  page:
    # Turns the feature on - route will be /authors/custom-author-url
    permalink: '/custom-author-url'
  // highlight-end
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b4a9057a

segments.source_content: The blog plugin will now generate:

translations.zh-CN: 博客插件现在将生成：

segments.source_content:
- a dedicated author page for each author ([example](/blog/authors/slorber)) listing all the blog posts they contributed to
- an authors index page ([example](/blog/authors)) listing all these authors, in the order they appear in `authors.yml`

translations.zh-CN:
- 每位作者的专属页面（[示例](/blog/authors/slorber)），列出其贡献的所有博客文章
- 作者索引页（[示例](/blog/authors)），按`authors.yml`中的顺序列出所有作者

segments.source_content:
:::warning[About inline authors]

Only [global authors](#global-authors) can activate this feature. [Inline authors](#inline-authors) are not supported.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning[关于内联作者]

仅支持[全局作者](#global-authors)使用此功能。[内联作者](#inline-authors)不受支持。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Blog post tags {#blog-post-tags}

translations.zh-CN: ## 博客文章标签 {#blog-post-tags}

segments.source_content: Tags are declared in the front matter and introduce another dimension of categorization.

translations.zh-CN: 标签通过front matter声明，提供了另一种分类维度。

segments.source_content: It is possible to define tags inline, or to reference predefined tags declared in a [`tags file`](api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#tags-file) (optional, usually `blog/tags.yml`).

translations.zh-CN: 可以内联定义标签，或引用预定义在[`标签文件`](api/plugins/plugin-content-blog.mdx#tags-file)中的标签（可选，通常为`blog/tags.yml`）。

segments.source_content: In the following example:

translations.zh-CN: 在以下示例中：

segments.source_content:
- `docusaurus` references a predefined tag key declared in `blog/tags.yml`
- `Releases` is an inline tag, because it does not exist in `blog/tags.yml`

translations.zh-CN:
- `docusaurus`引用的是`blog/tags.yml`中预定义的标签键
- `Releases`是内联标签，因为它不存在于`blog/tags.yml`中

segments.source_content:
```md title="blog/my-post.md"
---
title: 'My blog post'
tags:
  - Releases
  - docusaurus
---

Content
```

segments.source_content: ## Reading time {#reading-time}

translations.zh-CN: ## 阅读时长 {#reading-time}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus generates a reading time estimation for each blog post based on word count. We provide an option to customize this.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus会根据字数统计为每篇博客生成阅读时长估算。我们提供了自定义此功能的选项。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_ae548439

segments.source_content: The `readingTime` callback receives the following parameters:

translations.zh-CN: `readingTime`回调函数接收以下参数：

segments.source_content:
- `content`: the blog content text as a string
- `frontMatter`: the front matter as a record of string keys and their values
- `locale`: the locale of the current Docusaurus site
- `defaultReadingTime`: the default built-in reading time function. It returns a number (reading time in minutes) or `undefined` (disable reading time for this page).

translations.zh-CN:
- `content`：博客内容文本字符串
- `frontMatter`：front matter键值对记录
- `locale`：当前Docusaurus站点的语言环境
- `defaultReadingTime`：内置的默认阅读时长函数。返回数字（阅读分钟数）或`undefined`（禁用该页面的阅读时长显示）。

segments.source_content: The default reading time is able to accept additional options:

translations.zh-CN: 默认阅读时长函数可接受额外选项：

segments.source_content: - `wordsPerMinute` as a number (default: 300)

translations.zh-CN: - `wordsPerMinute`：数字类型（默认值：300）

segments.source_content: ## Feed {#feed}

segments.source_content: You can generate RSS / Atom / JSON feed by passing `feedOptions`. By default, RSS and Atom feeds are generated. To disable feed generation, set `feedOptions.type` to `null`.

segments.source_content: ## Advanced topics {#advanced-topics}

segments.source_content: ### Blog-only mode {#blog-only-mode}

translations.zh-CN: ### 纯博客模式 {#blog-only-mode}

segments.source_content: You can run your Docusaurus site without a dedicated landing page and instead have your blog's post list page as the index page. Set the `routeBasePath` to be `'/'` to serve the blog through the root route `example.com/` instead of the subroute `example.com/blog/`.

translations.zh-CN: 您可以将博客文章列表页设为网站首页，而非单独的着陆页。将 `routeBasePath` 设置为 `'/'` 后，博客将通过根路由（如 `example.com/`）而非子路由（如 `example.com/blog/`）提供服务。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_a378b093

segments.source_content:
:::warning

Don't forget to delete the existing homepage at `./src/pages/index.js` or else there will be two files mapping to the same route!

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

请务必删除现有的 `./src/pages/index.js` 首页文件，否则会出现两个文件映射到同一路由的情况！

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

If you disable the docs plugin, don't forget to delete references to the docs plugin elsewhere in your configuration file. Notably, make sure to remove the docs-related navbar items.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

若禁用文档插件，请同步删除配置文件中对文档插件的所有引用，尤其注意移除导航栏中与文档相关的条目。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::tip

There's also a "Docs-only mode" for those who only want to use the docs. Read [Docs-only mode](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx) for detailed instructions or a more elaborate explanation of `routeBasePath`.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

针对仅需文档功能的用户，我们还提供「纯文档模式」。详见[纯文档模式指南](./guides/docs/docs-introduction.mdx)了解 `routeBasePath` 的详细配置说明。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Multiple blogs {#multiple-blogs}

translations.zh-CN: ### 多博客系统 {#multiple-blogs}

segments.source_content: By default, the classic theme assumes only one blog per website and hence includes only one instance of the blog plugin. If you would like to have multiple blogs on a single website, it's possible too! You can add another blog by specifying another blog plugin in the `plugins` option for `docusaurus.config.js`.

translations.zh-CN: 经典主题默认假设每个网站只有一个博客，因此仅包含一个博客插件实例。若需在单个网站中部署多个博客，您可以在 `docusaurus.config.js` 的 `plugins` 选项中添加额外的博客插件。

segments.source_content: Set the `routeBasePath` to the URL route that you want your second blog to be accessed on. Note that the `routeBasePath` here has to be different from the first blog or else there could be a collision of paths! Also, set `path` to the path to the directory containing your second blog's entries.

translations.zh-CN: 为第二个博客设置专属的 `routeBasePath` 作为访问路径，注意此处必须与第一个博客的路径不同以避免冲突。同时通过 `path` 指定第二个博客内容的存储目录路径。

segments.source_content: As documented for [multi-instance plugins](./using-plugins.mdx#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids), you need to assign a unique ID to the plugins.

translations.zh-CN: 如[多实例插件文档](./using-plugins.mdx#multi-instance-plugins-and-plugin-ids)所述，需要为插件分配唯一ID。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_e328f97b
